enablePrediction.desc:: Enables predictive chunkloading, which predicts player movement and preloads an area in movement direction: default:true

predictiondidstanceoffset.desc:: Offset to the distance(based on simulation distance) at which chunk prediction starts pre-loading(circular): default:-2 chunks

predictionarea.desc:: Size of the area marked for preloading: default:7 chunks, max: 32, min: 2

enablePreGen.desc:: Enables predictive pre-gen far ahead of the player, to generate nonexisting chunks early so they load in time, requires enablePrediction: default:true

preGenArea.desc:: Size of the area marked for pregeneration: default:4 chunks, min 1, max 32

enableLazyChunkloading.desc:: Enables lazy chunkloading around the player, which makes the area loaded directly around the player react more slowly to player position changes.(Improves server performance, less chunks are loaded/unlaoded frequently) : default:true

lazyloadingspeed.desc:: Set the speed of lazy loading, increasing this makes the lazy chunk loading gets less lazy and react to player position changes faster: default:0.7

enableFasterChunkLoading.desc:: Enables faster chunk loading, which slightly improves the general chunk loading speed: default:true

debugLogging.desc:: Enables debug logging to show chunk loading changes: default:false
